## OptionalUnlessRequiredField type

Utility type which returns a partial optional of parameter type unless at least one field is required.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type OptionalUnlessRequiredField<O> = O extends Partial<O> ? O | undefined : O;
```
